column2: casual diner with top-notch food. I got a satisfying bowl of the Not Chinese Broccoli (but too small of a serving to be worth $8) and a slightly chewy but perfectly seasoned Kalbi Beef Ribs with watermelon. The watermelon complimented the meat so well
column3: love the creativity! My partner got some sort of Tonkatsu and cauliflower rice salad
column4: which appeared on their "Special/Seasonal" menu. It was all great.
